QuestData.Title: The Damsel's (Bad) Luck
QuestData.Description: I heard that this ship here is the Damsel's Luck. Didn't you used to be the captain of that thing? You must know your way around it, then.$b$bThe Brashtide are our main concern, but we still don't want to take an unnecessary pummeling from those cannons of theirs. Grab this rope behind me and take out some of those angry-looking corsairs. Check in with the Baron when you're done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Bloodsail Corsairs in Booty Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: Attacking your former crewmen...$b$bYou really have grown into a real pirate, $n!
